name: Shiatsu Massage Cushion
description: Ergonomically designed 3D massage heads provide a pleasant massage experience. It is especially recommended for use on the back, neck, palms, arms, calves. It can be used in the office, at home or even in the car.

name: Beurer foot massager
description: Warming function, easy to use with feet, promotes blood circulation in the reflex zones of the sole, shiatsu sole massage, breathable mesh material, power: 25W

name: Massage ball 6cm orange spiked
description: Massage balls increase overall well-being and stimulate blood circulation. Ideal for massaging gavel, soles, back, shoulders and waist.

name: Thera-Band massage ball 8cm yellow hard
description: Massage balls increase overall well-being and stimulate blood circulation. Ideal for massaging gavel, soles, back, shoulders and waist.

name: Capetan 14x33cm SMR foam roller
description: Foam rolling can be beneficial for easing sore muscles and reducing inflammation. Effective for easing pain in the body. It may help ease tension in the back, too.

name: Capetan Premium Plus SMR 13x33cm foam roller
description: Foam rolling can be beneficial for easing sore muscles and reducing inflammation. Effective for easing pain in the body. It may help ease tension in the back, too.

name: Massage bar SMR
description: Developed to treat muscle pain. According to its size and shape, it is suitable for myofascial massage, for example: for massaging the flexor muscle, calf, torso, neck and shoulders.

name: Blackroll twin smr roller
description: Provides accurate and perfect self-massage by stimulating the skin. Ideal for treating parallel muscle lines in the neck and back. Ideal for calf massage, stimulates and enhances tissue blood flow by the twisted surface of the middle section.
